mapper.sql: ID, PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_TYPE, START_TIME, STATUS
mapper.insert:
insert into JBF_PRODUCT
ID,
PROD_NO,
PROD_NAME,
PROD_TYPE,
START_TIME,
STATUS,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update JBF_PRODUCT
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NAME = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_TYPE = #{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update JBF_PRODUCT set PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_NAME = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_TYPE = #{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.PROD_NO from JBF_PRODUCT a where a.ID in (select MAX(ID) from JBF_PRODUCT)
